endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of available entertainment venues with essential details.
Get detailed information about a specific venue using its unique identifier.
Create a new booking for a selected venue and date.
List all bookings associated with the requesting user.
Cancel an existing booking using its unique identifier.
Check ticket availability for a specific venue and date.
Retrieve all user-subscribed notifications regarding ticket availability.
Submit a request to compare ticket prices among multiple venues.
Update user preferences related to venue features and notifications.
Receive recommendations for venues based on user preferences and booking history.
